translation.en: Police have urged citizens to stay vigilant.
FBI New York, how may I direct your call?
translation.ko: 뉴욕 FBI입니다 어떤 부서로 연결해 드릴까요?

translation.en: The attack will take place tomorrow at the corner of Lafayette and Worth Streets.
translation.ko: 내일 워스와 라파예트가 만나는 길모퉁이에 공격이 있을 겁니다

translation.en: Cordon off the area from midnight. Are you clear on that?
Sir, let me patch you through to our agents...
translation.ko: 직원 한 사람에게 연결해 드릴 테니…

translation.en: Please! Do exactly as I say or many people will die.
translation.ko: 부탁입니다! 제 말대로 하세요 아니면 많은 이가 죽을 겁니다

translation.en: This is not a crank call.
You said you'd take him off my hands.
I know there's something you're not telling me.
translation.ko: 나한테 뭔가 숨기고 있는 거 알아

translation.en: Don't let him watch the news.
Well, traffic on the FDR right now is looking pretty heavy...
translation.ko: 현재 뉴욕 FDR 도로에 교통 체증이 심각합니다

translation.en: ...this gridlock we're looking at probably won't let up for hours.
translation.ko: 몇 시간 동안 지속될 것 같은 도로 정체입니다

translation.en: Most of this traffic is headed downtown to the Westside...
translation.ko: 해당 구간의 차량 대부분은 시내 서쪽 방면으로…

translation.en: Why hasn't this intersection been sealed off?
Excuse me?
I said why hasn't this intersection been sealed off?
Didn't you get the tip-off about the attack? Sir. Sir, please calm down.
If you'll accompany me, we'll get this matter taken care of.
Sir, stop!
- Hey, man. - Stop!
I got him. Let's go! Move! Move!
Suspect sighted. Platform three.
Hey!
Out of the way! Let me through!
Forward car.
- Get off the train. - Why? What's wrong?
Just take the baby and get off the train.
What's your problem? Hold it right there, sir.
Transit police. I am asking you to stop!
That's him! You have to stop him!
Transit police. Turn around.
Now! Put your hands up!
Please! Please, I won't do it again, I promise! I'll give them back!
translation.ko: 제발요, 다시는 안 그럴게요 맹세코 돌려놓겠습니다

translation.en: I'll give them back! I'll give them back.
Next stop, Spring.
Move back! Move back!
Get out of the way!
Move outside.
...making their way through the massive tangle of wreckage...
translation.ko: 엄청난 잔해들 사이로 사람들이 나오고 있습니다

translation.en: ...New York City subway disaster since...
It could be the result of a terrorist plot...
Federal Aviation Administration officials...
...are investigating a possible link to the electrostatic bursts...
translation.ko: 이틀 전 렉싱턴 항공 참사를 일으킨 것으로 추정되는

translation.en: ...believed to have caused the Lexington air disaster of two days ago.
translation.ko: 정전기 폭발과의 연관성에 대해 조사 중입니다

translation.en: And NO AA, the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration...
...remains silent tonight.
But with the devastating subway crash in Manhattan...
...power cuts in Long Island and two more emergency...
translation.ko: 롱아일랜드 정전 사태가 생기고 두 건의 비상…

translation.en: Grace. I got held up by work. I'll be over in 30 minutes.
translation.ko: 그레이스, 일 때문에 늦었어 30분이면 끝날 거야

translation.en: No, I am fine. I'll see you in 30 minutes.
Three, four, five... Five, six...
Caleb, go inside.
- Hey. - Hi.
- Want to check out the house? - Sure.
You said October 19th?
My mother used to talk about that day all the time.
translation.ko: 엄마는 항상 그날에 대해 이야기하곤 했어요

translation.en: She said it was the day I was going to die.
All my life I've had this thing hanging over my head...
...and Abby's.
I just don't believe anyone can predict my future.
translation.ko: 누군가 내 미래를 예측하는 건 믿지 않아요

translation.en: And what does it matter, anyway?
We all die in the end.
I don't want to know what my future holds.
translation.ko: 내 미래가 어떻게 될지 알고 싶지 않아요

translation.en: Last year, my wife was on a business trip to Phoenix...
...a few days before my birthday...
...and a fire started in her hotel at 4:00 in the morning.
The investigators said that Allison died of smoke inhalation.
Died in her sleep.
She wouldn't have known anything about it.
While she was dying, I was at home, in the front yard.
translation.ko: 아내가 죽어 가는 동안 난 집 앞마당에 있었어요

translation.en: I always thought you were supposed to sense...
...when the people you love are in danger...
...but I didn't feel anything.
Nothing.
I was just blowing leaves off the lawn.
I am so sorry, John.
Well, but my point is that from then on...
...I decided that no one can know what was coming...
translation.ko: 누구도 무슨 일이 생길지 알 수 없다고 전 생각했고

translation.en: ...and life was just a string of random accidents and mistakes.
translation.ko: 인생은 우연한 사고와 실수의 연속이었다는 거예요

translation.en: And then I got that list.
If that had come to me before Allison left, I would have saved her life.
translation.ko: 앨리슨이 떠나기 전에 그 목록이 있었다면 구할 수 있었을 겁니다

translation.en: I need to know.
It's still here.
What's this?
Have you seen this?
Abby used to do this sometimes, write things backwards...
translation.ko: 애비가 가끔 이러거든요 글씨를 거꾸로 쓰는 거죠

translation.en: ...and that last number, I don't think it's 33.
translation.ko: 이 마지막 숫자는 33이 아닌 거 같아요

translation.en: It's EE.
EE? Initials. Someone she knew?
I don't know.
I was nine when she overdosed.
translation.ko: 엄마는 내가 아홉 살 때 약물 과다 복용으로 돌아가셨죠

translation.en: The only time I ever came out here was with my father...
...when he identified her body.
She willed the property to me...
...but I never came back for any of her things.
translation.ko: 엄마 유품을 보러 온 적이 없어요

translation.en: When I was little, my mother used to tell me that she could hear voices...
translation.ko: 내가 어릴 때 어떤 소리가 들린다고 했어요

translation.en: ...whispering to her...
...telling her horrible things.
And then one day, my dad came and took me away from her.
translation.ko: 어느 날 아빠가 와서는 엄마랑 날 떨어뜨려 놓으셨죠

translation.en: He said she was sick.
She said she moved out here to get ready.
translation.ko: 엄마는 준비를 위해 이곳으로 왔다고 했는데

translation.en: I never knew what she meant by that.
I made this for her one Christmas.
translation.ko: 크리스마스 때 엄마한테 만들어 준 거예요

translation.en: I never knew she kept it.
She used to stare at this picture for hours.
translation.ko: 엄마는 이 그림을 몇 시간 동안 보곤 했어요

translation.en: That's where they found her.
In there.
Have you seen enough?
Yeah. Ok. We'll go.
Abby?
Abby?
Abby.
Caleb.
Come.
Come with us.
EE isn't just one person.
Abby, no!
Abby!
What? What? What? It's ok. It's ok.
They were here.
Who? Who was here, Caleb?
- Did they hurt you? - No. They were talking to us.
What did they say?
I don't know. They were all talking at once.
They said we could go with them, if we chose to.
translation.ko: 우리가 원한다면 같이 갈 수 있다고 했어요

translation.en: - Who did, baby? Who? - The whisper people.
Hey, lock the doors.
What do you want with my son?
Answer me!
I just know they've been following us for days.
I think someone's been following me and Abby, too.
That's why she didn't write any coordinates down after the final date.
translation.ko: 그래서 마지막 날짜 뒤에 좌표를 안 남긴 거 같아요

translation.en: There isn't a single location this time.
Are you telling me that my mother could see the end of everything?
That we're all going to die tomorrow?
She was disturbed, John. She could've just made it all up.
translation.ko: 엄만 정상이 아니었어요 모두 꾸며낸 걸 수도 있죠

translation.en: She's been right so far, Diana.
About everything.
Abby's... Abby's all I've got, John.
I can't let anything happen to her.
translation.ko: 애비한테 어떤 일도 일어나게 둘 순 없어요

translation.en: Caleb, you really need to sleep.
I can hear them whispering to me sometimes like Abby can.
Could Lucinda hear them, too?
Yeah, I think she did. Yes.
Are me and Abby going to die?
No. I will never let that happen, Caleb.
translation.ko: 아니 케일럽, 그런 일 없게 아빠가 꼭 막을 거야

translation.en: Do you hear me? Never.
translation.ko: 아빠 말 알겠지? 절대 그럴 일 없어

translation.en: You...
Abby, what do you like to eat for breakfast?
Abby?
What are you doing, honey?
It's the sun.
There's something I need to check. Get Abby, you're coming with us.
translation.ko: 확인할 게 있어요 애비를 챙겨서 같이 가죠

translation.en: Caleb!
Ok. All right.
Hey, John, what happened?
Hey!
Talk to me. What happened?
I've been calling you off the hook ever since I heard about the subway.
John?
Do you remember that paper on extra-solar activity I published?
translation.ko: 내가 태양계 밖 활동에 관해 낸 논문 기억해?

translation.en: Yeah, sure, I remember.
I found evidence of a series of super-flares from a star in the outer-Pleiades region.
translation.ko: 일련의 슈퍼 플레어 증거를 찾았었지 플레이아데스성단 바깥쪽 항성에서 말이야 "코로나 질량 방출-플레이아데스"

translation.en: Right. Ratings were off the chart.
We were both wrong. The numbers are a warning...
...but not just to me or any random group.
translation.ko: 나나 특정 사람들한테만 하는 경고가 아니라

translation.en: They're a warning to everyone.
Ok. You're officially scaring the shit out of me right now.
The super-flare, in our own solar system.
A 100 microtesla wave of radiation...
...that would destroy our ozone layer, killing every living organism on the planet.
translation.ko: 100마이크로테슬라 복사파면 오존층을 파괴할 거야 지구상 모든 생명체가 죽는 거지

translation.en: We have to let everyone know. We have to call the NOAA.
They already know. The announcement will come anytime now.
translation.ko: 이미 알고 있어 얼마 안 있어서 발표하겠지

translation.en: I thought there was some purpose to all of this.
Why did I get this prediction if there's nothing I can do about it?
translation.ko: 내가 할 수 있는 일이 없는데 왜 이런 예측을 알게 됐을까?

translation.en: How am I supposed to stop the end of the world?
Go home, Phil. Be with Kim tonight.
translation.ko: 집에 가, 필 킴과 같이 있어

translation.en: Diana.
I am so stupid.
I've spent my whole life knowing she was right...
...and pretending that she was insane.
If we hide underground, we've got a chance, don't we?
translation.ko: 지하로 숨으면 살 수 있지 않을까요?

translation.en: It's possible.
I know some caves off Route 40 past Groton.
translation.ko: 그로턴 너머 40번 국도 쪽에 동굴들이 있어요

translation.en: Hardly anyone knows about them, but I used to play there as a child.
translation.ko: 내가 어릴 적부터 놀던 데고 아는 사람이 몇 없을 거예요

translation.en: We could try there, right?
- Ok. - Ok.
Caleb, put some clothes and shoes into your backpack.
Diana, load all the non-perishable food, any water you can, into the truck.
translation.ko: 다이애나는 상하지 않을 음식과 물을 트럭에 실어 줘요

translation.en: Let's try to be out of here in 10 minutes.
- You start. I'll get some bags. - Yeah.
Allison wanted me to call you...
translation.ko: 앨리슨은 늘 아버지한테 제가 전화하길 바랐어요

translation.en: ...the day she left for Phoenix.
She wanted me to promise her that I'd call you.
I know, Jonathan.
We haven't spoken in so long, I don't really even know why anymore.
translation.ko: 오랫동안 대화를 못 했는데 그 이유가 인제 기억 안 나요

translation.en: I need to tell you something.
Yes?
That sermon you preached every year at Pentecost, about the gifts of the Spirit...
translation.ko: 오순절에 늘 하시는 설교 말이에요 성령의 은사요

translation.en: ...one was the gift of prophecy.
1 Corinthians 12. Yes, I remember it. The church should respect the prophet.
translation.ko: 고린도전서 12장이지, 맞아 교회는 선지자를 존중해야 해

translation.en: I have a prophecy.
It's about to be proven accurate.
I need you to respect it and receive it as the truth.
translation.ko: 아버지가 이걸 존중하고 진실로 받아들였으면 해요

translation.en: This heat we're experiencing isn't going to get better.
translation.ko: 우리가 지금 겪고 있는 더위는 나아지지 않을 겁니다

translation.en: It's going to get worse, much worse.
I need you to get Mom and Grace and any supplies you can...
translation.ko: 어머니와 그레이스를 데리고 최대한 물품을 챙겨서

translation.en: ...and get below ground tonight. The basement, the sewer, the T.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 지하로 내려가세요 지하실, 하수관, 지하철역이요

translation.en: Just get as deep as you can and as fast as you can.
And that will keep us safe from this heat?
translation.ko: 그럼 이 열로부터 안전하게 지켜지는 거냐?

translation.en: I don't know that, but we have to try, right?
translation.ko: 잘 모르겠지만 해 봐야죠 안 그래요?

translation.en: I am sorry, John, but I am afraid I am not going anywhere tonight or any night.
translation.ko: 존, 미안하지만 아무 데도 가지 않을 거란다 오늘 밤이 아니어도

translation.en: I appreciate your concern, but if it's my time, it's my time.
translation.ko: 걱정해 줘서 고맙지만 때가 된 거면 받아들여야지

translation.en: I am ready whenever the good Lord calls me.
Are you?
- Dad? - Hello?
- John? - Dad?
Caleb, let's go!
Caleb.
Caleb.
Caleb!
Caleb, stop!
- Caleb! - Huh? Huh?
What were you doing?
Did I do that?
This isn't the way to the highway.
Everybody wait here.
John!
John!
John, please, why are we back here?
John, please, what are you doing? We have to get to the caves.
translation.ko: 제발, 뭐 하는 거예요? 동굴로 들어가야 해요

translation.en: - We're not going to the caves. - What?
She knew the coordinates for this last event.
She tried to write them down.
The teacher said she was interrupted, ran out of time...
translation.ko: 선생님이 시간이 다 됐다며 루신다를 막았다고 했어요

translation.en: ...so she scratched them into this door.
She tried to tell us where to go.
You're not making any sense. Look at you. Look at what you're doing!
translation.ko: 이해가 안 돼요 말도 안 되는 짓이에요

translation.en: The numbers are the key to everything.
Please! Please, John, we need to leave!
We're taking my car. Come on. Let's go. Keep your bags with you.
translation.ko: 내 차를 타야겠다, 이리 와 얼른 가자, 배낭 챙기렴

translation.en: Be here, please, be here.
Throw it in the back.
What about Dad?
He's just got to finish what he's doing. He's going to follow us.
translation.ko: 아빠는 일을 마무리해야 해 곧 따라오실 거야

translation.en: We're just getting a head start, ok?
Diana?
Caleb!
Caleb!
Caleb!
Caleb!
Where are we going, Mom? Are we hiding from the whisper people?
translation.ko: 어디 가는 거예요, 엄마? 속삭임에서 도망치는 거예요?

translation.en: Yes, baby. They won't find us where we're going.
translation.ko: 맞아, 우리가 어딜 가든 인제 찾지 못할 거야

translation.en: Mom, they know where we are.
translation.ko: 엄마, 그들은 우리가 어디 있는지 다 알아요

translation.en: - How do you know that? - They told us so.
- You've seen them again? - No. They just talk to us.
translation.ko: 그것들을 또 봤니? 아뇨, 우리한테 말을 해요

translation.en: How, Abby? How do they talk to you?
They whisper into our heads.
Oh, God.
Oh, God.
- I want to call my dad. - The phones are down!
I promise he's right behind us! We'll call him when we get there!
translation.ko: 아빠는 우리 뒤에 계셔 도착해서 전화하면 돼!

translation.en: Wait right here!
Now let's get back to the financial markets, if we may, for a moment.
translation.ko: 잠깐 다시 돌아가서 금융 시장 소식을 들어 보겠습니다

translation.en: Let's check it out on the grid here this morning. We've got Treasuries moving up...
translation.ko: 오늘 아침 이 그리드를 보시면 재무 증권이 상승…

translation.en: Yeah, thanks. Thanks.
Number five.
...India is a better bet than the US or Europe...
...and that the dollar will continue its long slide...
This is an Emergency Broadcast Transmission.
This is not a test. This is an Emergency Broadcast Transmission.
translation.ko: 모의 방송이 아닙니다 긴급 경보 방송입니다

translation.en: - Today, NO AA has concluded... - Turn that up!
...the solar flares may last longer...
...and cause more damage to our infrastructure than we originally thought.
translation.ko: 인프라에 끼치는 피해가 예상한 것보다도 더 클 수 있다고 발표했습니다

translation.en: We're recommending that people stay indoors until further notice.
translation.ko: 추후 안내가 있을 때까지 실내에 머물기를 권고합니다

translation.en: Bring your pets inside. Stock up on extra water and, if possible...
translation.ko: 반려동물을 실내로 데려오시고 여분의 물을 비축하십시오

translation.en: ...seek out fortified underground shelter.
- General, what time is it happening? - General, excuse me...
translation.ko: - 사령관님, 몇 시에 일어나는 거죠? - 사령관님!

translation.en: The shelters we have are currently overwhelmed.
The best advice we can offer the public is to seek your own.
translation.ko: 대피할 장소를 물색하는 게 최선의 방법입니다

translation.en: Sir! One more question about the warning.
We are assessing this information as it becomes available.
It was only recently confirmed.
Where is the President?
The President and his staff... ...are currently being transported to a secure location.
translation.ko: 대통령님과 참모들은 현재 안전한 곳으로 이동 중입니다

translation.en: - Hello? - Dad?
Caleb, are you ok? Tell me exactly where you are.
translation.ko: 케일럽, 너 괜찮니? 정확히 어디인지 알려줘

translation.en: We're at a gas station. I don't know where.
The damage information regarding the destructive power of these flares...
...is a scientific matter, and I am not going to speculate...
Are you coming with us?
translation.ko: - 우리랑 같이 가는 거죠? - 거기 그대로 있으렴

translation.en: I need you to stay right there. Get me an...
translation.ko: - 우리랑 같이 가는 거죠? - 거기 그대로 있으렴 - 아빠한테… - 케일럽, 차로 돌아가

translation.en: Caleb, get back to the car now.
- Caleb? - John?
- Where are you? - We're in Westford.
I am sorry. I had to do this for Abby and for Caleb.
translation.ko: 미안해요, 애들을 위해선 이럴 수밖에 없었어요

translation.en: - I am taking them to the caves. - I found the numbers!
They're the location of your mother's mobile home.
translation.ko: 당신 어머니의 이동 주택이 있는 데예요

translation.en: That's where we've got to go.
- Don't do this to me. Please. - I know how it sounds.
translation.ko: 나한테 이러지 마요, 제발 기막힌 말인 거 알아요

translation.en: You want us to head toward the place where this is supposed to happen?
Are you insane?
It's a chance we got to take or we're all going to die!
translation.ko: 이 기회를 놓치면 우리 모두 죽어요!

translation.en: Stay where you are! I'll be right there!
translation.ko: 바로 갈 테니까 거기 그대로 있어요

translation.en: No! If we go to the caves, we have a chance!
translation.ko: 싫어요! 동굴로 가야 살 수 있어요

translation.en: You said the sun can't reach that far!
translation.ko: 태양이 그 깊이까진 못 온다고 그랬잖아요!

translation.en: The caves won't save us! Nothing can!
translation.ko: 동굴은 우릴 못 살려요! 그 무엇도요

translation.en: The radiation will penetrate a mile into the Earth's crust! Do you hear me?
Our only shot is to go where the numbers want us to go.
translation.ko: 우리가 유일하게 가 볼 곳은 숫자가 말하는 곳이에요!

translation.en: - It's what we're meant to do! - No, I don't believe you!
translation.ko: - 그래야만 한다고요 - 아니요, 믿을 수 없어요!

translation.en: I am taking the children! We have to save the children!
translation.ko: 애들은 내가 데려가요! 우린 애들을 구해야 한다고요

translation.en: Don't you move, Diana! Caleb is my son, and I'll decide where he goes!
translation.ko: 움직이지 마요, 다이애나 케일럽은 내 아들이에요 내 아들을 멋대로 데려가지 마요!

translation.en: Diana! Caleb! Are you there?
Abby!
Abby! Abby!
Help! Somebody took my daughter!
Abby!
Damn it!
Where did she go?
Everyone needs to do this immediately.
We are facing a natural threat of global proportions...
...and there is very little that this government...
translation.ko: 정부가 할 수 있는 일은 거의 없습니다

translation.en: Same thing happened with Y2K.
They are going to wake up tomorrow morning feeling pretty stupid.
Thirty minutes ago there was a woman here. She was screaming!
translation.ko: 30분 전에 여기서 한 여성이 소리를 질렀죠?

translation.en: She was with a kid! He was on your pay phone! He's a nine-year-old kid!
translation.ko: 그 여자랑 있던 아이요! 공중전화에 있었고 9살이에요

translation.en: Some guy took the lady's car with the kids inside. Drove right off with it.
translation.ko: 누가 그 여자 차를 가져갔어요 애들은 그 안에 있었고요 그대로 떠나 버렸다니까요

translation.en: - The woman, where'd she go? - That way!
Go lock the door! Stop that, you crazy...
You've got to pay for that! Hey, stop!
translation.ko: 돈 내고 가야지! 이봐, 거기 서!

translation.en: You need to seek protection from the sun... ...and it needs to be immediately.
translation.ko: 태양 광선을 피할 곳을 당장 찾으셔야 합니다

translation.en: We're facing a deadly threat.
Get out! I didn't see you!
Hey! Get out of here!
- Is she... Where are the children? - We can't help you now, sir.
Calm down, all of you! Just calm down!
Charge.
Clear.
Again.
- Ok, call it. - 12:00 midnight exactly.
There's a man down. We need help.
translation.ko: 한 남성이 쓰러져 있어요 도움이 필요합니다

translation.en: Diana.
I am sorry.
Caleb!
Where is he?
Where's Caleb?
I want my son!
I want my son!
Now!
Dad, don't!
Are you hurt? What did he do to you?
translation.ko: 다친 데는 없니? 저놈이 무슨 짓은 안 했고?

translation.en: It's ok, Dad. I am ok. This is my friend.
translation.ko: 아빠, 난 괜찮아요 얜 내 친구예요

translation.en: They said I can keep him.
Caleb, I want you to come with me. We're going now.
translation.ko: 케일럽, 아빠랑 가자 지금 떠나야 해

translation.en: But we have to go with them.
They won't hurt us.
Abby, are you ok?
- Your mom wanted to be here, honey. - I know.
The whisper people told me that Mommy's safe now.
translation.ko: 속삭이는 사람들이 이제 엄마가 괜찮다고 했어요

translation.en: They've been protecting us all along, Dad.
They sent a message ahead of them to prepare the way...
translation.ko: 저들이 준비하도록 미리 메시지를 보낸 거고

translation.en: ...and now they've come for us.
Who are you?
It's time to go, Dad. They've chosen us so we can start over.
translation.ko: 갈 시간이에요, 아빠 새롭게 시작할 수 있도록 우릴 선택한 거예요

translation.en: So everything can start over.
translation.ko: 모든 걸 다시 시작할 수 있어요

translation.en: What do you mean? I don't understand.
Why is he saying that, Dad?
translation.ko: 왜 저런 말을 하는 거죠 아빠?

translation.en: What?
What's he saying, Caleb?
He's saying only the chosen must go...
...those who heard the call.
Please.
I can't go with you, Caleb. I mean, I can't go with you.
translation.ko: 아빠는 너랑 갈 수 없어 아빠는 갈 수가 없단다

translation.en: They've chosen us to go.
They haven't chosen us, Caleb.
They've chosen you, both of you.
You have to take care of Abby now. You have to be strong for her.
translation.ko: 이제 애비를 잘 돌봐야 해 더 강해져야 한다

translation.en: No. I don't want to go without you.
They could've taken you away from me, but they didn't...
translation.ko: 저들이 널 데려갈 수 있지만 그러지 않잖니

translation.en: ...because you have to make this decision yourself.
translation.ko: 이 결정은 네가 스스로 내려야 하기 때문이야

translation.en: But you promised.
You said we'd be together forever.
We will be. We will be. I am not leaving you.
But you have to go with them. You have to go. You have to go with them.
translation.ko: 하지만 넌 저들과 가야 해 함께 가야 한단다

translation.en: Caleb, Caleb, listen to me, Caleb. Stop, stop. Stop. Listen to me. Listen.
translation.ko: 케일럽, 아빠 말 들어 봐 울지 말고 들어

translation.en: We're going to be together. We're all going to be together.
translation.ko: 우린 반드시 함께할 거야 우리 모두 함께할 거야

translation.en: And Mom's going to be with us, too. I know it. I know that now.
translation.ko: 엄마도 우리와 함께할 거야 아빠가 약속할게

translation.en: Look. Here. Take this.
Take this. Keep it with you.
One day, you'll know what it means.
translation.ko: 언젠가 이게 무슨 뜻인지 알게 될 거야

translation.en: I love you, Daddy.
Where's Caleb?
Caleb's safe.
We're going to stay on the air for as long as possible.
translation.ko: 가능한 한 계속 방송을 진행하도록 하겠습니다 "세계 위기"

translation.en: All we can say is what we've been repeating all morning.
translation.ko: 오전 내내 드린 말씀만 반복할 수밖에 없습니다

translation.en: Get to any kind of underground shelter.
We've been told the satellite...
This isn't the end, Son.
I know.
